title: Internal Network Penetration Test
description: A penetration tester, having gained initial access to a workstation, must attempt to escalate privileges to Domain Admin.

tasks.description: Enumerate the local host and network to find potential paths for privilege escalation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester identifies a service running with weak permissions and a list of active domain users.

tasks.description: Attempt to exploit a known vulnerability in the weakly configured service to gain system-level privileges on the local host.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester successfully exploits the service and gains SYSTEM-level access.

tasks.description: Use the elevated privileges to dump credentials from memory and use them to access a Domain Controller, successfully escalating to Domain Admin.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester successfully compromises the domain, achieving the test's objective.
